predicate.note: Frames file for 'vomit' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 40.1.2.

example.name: nominal, no args
example.text: The council's annual report has psyllium on its last page, lumped with such unglamorous export items as sarsaparilla and ``Nux vomica,'' a plant that induces vomiting.

example.name: down-home cooking
example.text: John vomited up the dinner that Mary made for him
example.arg: the dinner that Mary made for him
